title: Automated Legal Discovery Platform TRD
description: Hierarchical decomposition of functional requirements extracted from the product requirements plan (PRP).

children.title: Architecture & Platform Governance
children.description: Foundational technical architecture, repository structure, and security governance expectations.

children.title: Authoritative architecture documentation
children.description: Maintain accurate documentation that reflects the actual system topology, data flows, and component responsibilities to satisfy TRD transparency requirements.

children.title: Canonical monorepo layout
children.description: Provide the prescribed `/apps/backend`, `/apps/frontend`, `/infra`, `/docs`, and `/tests` structure with active code in each area as mandated by the PRP.

children.title: Reproducible developer environment
children.description: Ship devcontainers or equivalent environment automation plus language-specific dependency locks for backend and frontend stacks.

children.title: Security and governance baseline
children.description: Define threat models, access controls, and compliance guardrails including audit trail strategy before feature delivery.

children.title: Data Pipeline & Knowledge Fabric
children.description: Ingestion, enrichment, indexing, and graph construction workflows powering retrieval-augmented intelligence.

children.title: Document ingestion orchestrator
children.description: Asynchronous ingestion service handling uploads, folder sync, and API triggers with reliability controls.

children.title: OCR and multimodal transcription
children.description: Vision-LLM or OCR microservice converting scanned material into machine-readable text with QA heuristics.

children.title: LLM-driven parsing & classification
children.description: Metadata extraction, entity tagging, and privilege risk scoring using language models per TRD workflow diagrams.

children.title: Embedding & vector indexing
children.description: Vector store population (Qdrant/Pinecone) with hybrid retrieval configuration and persistence management.

children.title: Knowledge graph construction
children.description: Graph extraction pipeline writing triples to Neo4j/Memgraph and exposing Cypher/GraphQL interfaces.

children.title: Event timeline synthesis
children.description: Automated timeline builder aligning events, citations, and contradictions with exportable visualizations.

children.title: Agent Orchestration & Automation
children.description: Coordinated network of specialized agents delivering casework, research, and self-improvement capabilities.

children.title: Autogen-style multi-agent network
children.description: Configured roster of coordinating, legal research, timeline, and tooling agents with explicit policies and memory.

children.title: Voice-enabled co-counsel agent
children.description: Primary persona delivering empathetic voice/text assistance with tool orchestration and citation discipline.

children.title: Self-improving developer agent
children.description: Agent that drafts patches, runs evaluations, and ships approved updates through automated workflows.

children.title: Agentic evaluation harness
children.description: Automated assessments verifying delegation, grounding, and regression behavior for agent swarms.

children.title: Experience Layer & Differentiators
children.description: User-facing applications including chat, document exploration, trial preparation, and educational modules.

children.title: Neon chat console with citations
children.description: Real-time chat UI surfacing inline citations that open contextual snippets per TRD UX guidelines.

children.title: Integrated document viewer
children.description: Embedded viewer supporting uploads, highlights, and synchronized citation jumps.

children.title: Interactive timeline UI
children.description: Scrollable/zoomable timeline with category filters, pop-out event cards, and evidence links.

children.title: Voice I/O controls
children.description: Microphone capture, wake word detection, speech synthesis, and playback management integrated into the client.

children.title: Mock courtroom simulator
children.description: Animated simulation environment with judge, opposing counsel, and witness personas for practice sessions.

children.title: Trial University knowledge hub
children.description: Educational library and retrieval interface for case law, procedural guides, and adaptive lessons.

children.title: Operational Excellence & Compliance
children.description: Deployment automation, observability, testing, and security certifications supporting enterprise readiness.

children.title: Continuous integration & delivery
children.description: Automated pipelines covering build, lint, test, and deployment promotions with artifact provenance.

children.title: Observability & SLO management
children.description: Tracing, metrics, logging, and alerting aligned to ingestion latency, retrieval accuracy, and agent responsiveness.

children.title: Security, privacy, and compliance
children.description: Zero-trust controls, tenant isolation, audit logging, and readiness for SOC2/HIPAA/GDPR audits.

children.title: Automated testing portfolio
children.description: Unit, integration, load, and chaos testing harnesses achieving coverage thresholds defined by the TRD.

children.title: Monetization & Market Strategy
children.description: Commercial packaging, pricing, and sales enablement deliverables required for premium positioning.

children.title: $1k/mo pricing justification
children.description: ROI models, packaging of premium differentiators, and readiness to defend value-based pricing.

children.title: Go-to-market enablement
children.description: Sales demos, collateral, and pilot programs to onboard anchor firms and capture testimonials.

children.title: Continuous Innovation
children.description: Long-term differentiators including reinforcement learning loops and ecosystem expansion.

children.title: Reinforcement learning feedback loop
children.description: Collect attorney feedback, train reward models, and ship controlled RLHF updates.

children.title: Plugin marketplace
children.description: Ecosystem for certified plugins, SDK contracts, and partner revenue sharing.
